sentences.en: "Tell them to hold all my calls, Theresa," she instructed her dresser.
sentences.cn: “特雷莎，告诉他们我所有的电话都别挂。”她吩咐她的服装师。

sentences.en: a privately held company
sentences.cn: 私有公司

sentences.en: A single CD-ROM can hold more than 500 megabytes of data.
sentences.cn: 一张只读存储光盘能容纳500兆以上的数据。

sentences.en: A thanksgiving ceremony was held to mark the occasion.
sentences.cn: 举行了一个感恩仪式以庆祝这一特别的时刻。

sentences.en: Could you hold my bag for me?
sentences.cn: 你能帮我拿着包吗？

sentences.en: Do you hold a valid passport?
sentences.cn: 你持有有效护照吗？

sentences.en: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.cn: 雇员持有30%的股份。

sentences.en: Experts hold varying opinions as to the causes of the disease.
sentences.cn: 专家们对该病的病因各持不同意见。

sentences.en: Further copies of the book are held in the library.
sentences.cn: 这本书在图书馆还存有一些。

sentences.en: He continued to hold a lead in Angola's presi-dential race.
sentences.cn: 他继续在安哥拉总统大选中占据领先地位。

sentences.en: He holds shares in ICI.
sentences.cn: 他持有帝国化学工业集团的股份。

sentences.en: He stifled his temptation to take hold of Ivy and shake her.
sentences.cn: 他压抑住想要抓住艾薇摇晃她的冲动。

sentences.en: He struggled to hold the bike down on the banked corners.
sentences.cn: 拐过斜弯时他竭力将自行车把稳。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭手臂将那人按住，直到警察赶来。

sentences.en: held back valuable information; held back my tears.
sentences.cn: 保留有价值的信息；忍住眼泪

sentences.en: held the creditors off.
sentences.cn: 远离债权人

sentences.en: held the essay up as a model for the students.
sentences.cn: 把这篇论文给学生作范例

sentences.en: Hold it up so that we can see it.
sentences.cn: 把它举起来让我们看看。

sentences.en: Hold the knife at an angle.
sentences.cn: 斜握着刀。

sentences.en: holds down two jobs.
sentences.cn: 有两份工作

sentences.en: I don't hold with your theories.
sentences.cn: 我不同意你的理论

sentences.en: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.cn: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.en: I realized that the woman had a hold over my father.
sentences.cn: 我意识到那女人控制着我父亲。

sentences.en: If only he would hold her close to him.
sentences.cn: 要是他能将她拥入怀中就好了。

sentences.en: In April, the President held talks with Chinese leaders.
sentences.cn: 4月，总统和中国领导人举行了会谈。

sentences.en: It does hold you to certain standards of fairness.
sentences.cn: 它的确能让你恪守某些公平原则。

sentences.en: Jane is determined to hold on to her fortune.
sentences.cn: 简决心要守住自己的财产。

sentences.en: Just hold tight to my hand and follow along.
sentences.cn: 抓紧我的手，跟着我。

sentences.en: Let's hold off until we have more data.
sentences.cn: 等到有更多资料时再做

sentences.en: Lift your head off the floor and hold this position for five seconds.
sentences.cn: 把头抬离地面，保持这个姿势五秒钟。

sentences.en: managed to hold up under the daily stress.
sentences.cn: 想办法应付每天的生活压力

sentences.en: Our food is holding out nicely.
sentences.cn: 我们的食物还很多

sentences.en: Please hold the noise down.
sentences.cn: 请限制音量

sentences.en: She can hold her own against almost any player.
sentences.cn: 她几乎能和任何一名选手一较高下。

sentences.en: She held to her resolutions.
sentences.cn: 她很忠于自己的决定

sentences.en: She was determined not to let the illness take hold again.
sentences.cn: 她决心不让疾病再次击垮自己。

sentences.en: She was holding a large box.
sentences.cn: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.en: The couple hold the unfashionable view that marriage is a sacred union.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩对婚姻的看法很传统，认为婚姻是神圣的结合。

sentences.en: The defending garrison held out for a month.
sentences.cn: 防卫部队已坚守了一个月

sentences.en: The film was held over for weeks.
sentences.cn: 电影又继续放了几星期

sentences.en: The funeral was held on a grey day in November.
sentences.cn: 葬礼在11月的一个阴天举行。

sentences.en: The group said it continues to hold 1,774,687 Vons shares.
sentences.cn: 该集团称其继续持有1,774,687股冯氏公司的股份。

sentences.en: They're likely to hold big fire sales to liquidate their inventory.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会举行清仓大甩卖。

sentences.en: This year’s conference will be held at the Hilton Hotel.
sentences.cn: 今年的会议将在希尔顿酒店召开。

sentences.en: Weapons were held at various sites.
sentences.cn: 武器存放在不同地点。

words.tran_cn: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

phrases.phrase: be left holding the baby (或美bag)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（尤指没有警告）被加一项责任
稍待：尤指不挂上电话以等待想要的或要求的事物
紧紧抓住，抓住不放；保持住
制衡，应付：仍然有效或不失力量地继续下去；应付
暂停；尚未办理的事情；等候接听；把持住的（指有问题的）

trans.tran_en: control, power, or influence over something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 握，抓；支持；装得下；认为；举行
trans.tran_en: to have a meeting, party, election etc in a particular place or at a particular time

trans.tran_cn: 拿着，按住，保持…，支撑重量，容纳，拘留，控制，吸引住，把…固定住，储备，拥有，担任，赢得，持有，认为，举行，平稳行驶，继续唱，不挂断，停止，保卫
trans.tran_en: to keep something to be used when it is needed
to have a particular opinion or belief

trans.tran_cn: 拿，握；使保持某种状态；掌握；推迟，延迟；拥有，保存；托住，支承；认为，相信；吸引；占据，据守；容纳；举行
trans.tran_en: to have a meeting, party, election etc in a particular place or at a particular time
